data.name: Evil Genius 2: Digital Art Book
data.detailed_description:
The Art of Evil Genius 2: World Domination

This free 64-page PDF showcases a collection of concept art created in bringing the stylish world of Evil Genius 2 to life. This artwork will provide an insight into the attention and creativity applied to every aspect of its realization - characters, lair, furniture, loot, traps and gadgets.

To find the content after installing:
Right-click on Evil Genius 2 in your Steam games library, and select ‘Properties…’ Under the Local Files tab click ‘Browse…’ – this will open the install folder, and The Art of Evil Genius 2: World Domination is in the folder called 'Artbook'

data.short_description: The Art of Evil Genius 2: World Domination

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 1030 2GB (or AMD equivalent)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770K, AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1660 Super 6GB, Radeon RX 5700 8GB
